NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Consumption Venues and column Waste Management is the flow between 30087 and 39077? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Recycling to node Retailers and from node Slaughterhouses to node Homes, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Dairies to node Homes, from node Beverage Plants to node Homes, and from node Canneries to node Homes, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Distribution Channels of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Slaughterhouses to target node Greenhouses? Please list all node labels along this path.
